remarks: The limit of an infinite series of nonnegative reals is nonnegative. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 9-Feb-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Feb-2014.)

iserge0.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) $.
iserge0.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> 0 <_ ( F ` k ) ) $.
iserge0 $p |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) $.
$d A k $.
